description: Matayoshi Coffee Farm, located in Okinawa, Japan, is a pioneering initiative that transitioned from a rose garden to a sustainable coffee farm in 2016. This project aims to cultivate coffee without pesticides, embracing local practices and educating the community about coffee culture. The farm features a caf√©, a farm stay, and various tourist experiences, all while striving to develop unique Okinawan coffee beans and promote sustainability amidst challenges like climate change and cultural shifts.
name: Matayoshi Coffee Farm
